title: 💸👀 TOUR TODAY FOR $990 OFF MOVE-IN RENT 💸
posting_body: Welcome To Spring water Crossing Spring water Crossing offers one and two-bedroom apartments and two and three-bedroom townhomes in pastoral Gresham Oregon, the gateway to the Columbia River Gorge and the World Class Mt. Hood Ski and recreation area.
Enjoy more “me time” with our array of community amenities including; tot-lot, resident lounge, and 24-hour fitness center.
Our convenient location just off NW Division Street, is moments from shopping, eateries, and entertainment.
Pamper yourself in style at Spring water Crossing.
Schedule your tour today!
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
Apartment Features:
°Ceiling fans
°Air conditioner
°Patio or balcony
°Gas range
°Fireplace
°Window coverings
Community Features:
°A short drive to Downtown Portland, Mt. Hood, Multnomah Falls and Columbia River Gorge where you can find, °hiking, swimming, kayaking, and wind surfing
°Fitness Center equipped to meet all your workout needs with 24-hour access
°Rental Furniture Available From CORT
°Free renting advice and discounts from Roost
°Close to Mt. Hood Community College, Gresham station, and public transportation
°Beautifully landscaped community featuring breathe- taking views and playgrounds.
